Title: Ebirah, Horror of the Deep
Actors: Akira Takarada, Kumi Mizuno, Chôtarô Tôgin
Plot: A teen searching for his brother stows away on a criminal's boat that shipwrecks on Letchi island, where terrorists have enslaved the Infant Island natives. Discovering Godzilla asleep, they decide to awaken him to liberate the na...
